title: Custom Bot Games annoying you?
body:
Dear Riot

I am sick and tired of joining custom games just to find out they are filled with bots.
if you can plz make a way to distinguish these game without actually clicking on them.
like a little icon or or a "with bots" text. I am aware that Riot might never actually see this post
 **so plz for the sake of not wasting time get this to where riot can see this**

replies.body: Some people like to make games with bots, and if you connect to one you can just quit and enter a new one. If you want a competitive game though, I don't know why you would connect to random customs.
Don't join random customs, get friends and create your own ones
